metadata.description: The world's most famous detective meets the world's most famous magician... and death ensues! Famed detective Sherlock Holmes and brash showman Harry Houdini must combine forces to defeat a mysterious mystic dedicated to destroying Houdini's career and killing anyone who gets in his way. A new five-issue series by Anthony Del Col and Conor McCreery, the Harvey Award-nominated creators of Kill Shakespeare.
metadata.name: Sherlock Holmes vs. Harry Houdini
